alert.note: Alert for Quay; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 2:28PM MDT until May 23 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... Central Quay County in east central New Mexico... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Tucumcari, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tucumcari and Logan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 316 and 348. State Road 104 between Mile Markers 92 and 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
